text: so you guys have been asking for more
and more kale recipes and this is one of
my favorites is also the perfect
summertime potluck contribution your
hosts will love you for it start with 2
ounces which is about 2 packed cups of
Tuscan kale leaves torn into about 1 and
1/2 inch pieces so tear these up last
one so kale is done we're gonna add our
kale to a farro base and I love using
farro in the summer because I feel like
it's just a really nice nutty but sort
of light grain and it's a nice switch up
from potato salad when you're by far
make sure you're buying either whole or
semi pearled and that means more of the
bran is still intact and that's where
all the nutrition is so I cooked one cup
of farro about 30 minutes on the
stovetop let it cool completely and then
we're going to add our kale 2 cups give
it a stir to this a quarter cup of
minced red onion lover our red onion I'm
going to add a quarter cup of thinly
sliced mint wouldn't be a salad without
a little lemon zest grating the zest
right into my salad bowl and this way I
keep all of those delicious aromatic
oils with the salad and not on my
cutting board and not on measuring
students so for this recipe we're using
the zest and the juice and they both
lend very different flavors to dishes
the zest adds a really nice sort of more
mellow bright citrusy flavor whereas the
juice is really bright and acidic and
wakes you up so one is more sweet and
one is a little bit more acidic so we're
gonna stir this together
make sure everything's nice and coated
give a little taste
a little bit more pepper touch it olive
oil and I'm gonna let this chill for
about a half an hour in the fridge
before I serve it so spend the half an
hour and all the flavors are nice and
melded so let's eat
mmm a really smells so wonderful so nice
and rich this looks great one of the
things I love most about this salad also
is that the grey and a vegetable ratio
is about 1 to 1 which you don't always
see so another easy way to get all of
your vegetables in for the day so to
finish it off I'm adding 1/4 cup of
crumbled feta and this adds such a
lovely tangy creaminess without having
to use too much extra cheese we're gonna
add a little bit more pepper and some
fresh mint sprigs so this salad will
keep beautifully for a couple days in
the fridge you can bring it to a potluck
you can make it in advance and make sure
you always have a healthy lunch for work
a couple more sprigs just smelling so
nice gorgeous try
hmmm so delicious got kale hearty grains
bright lemony summer salad this is what
